name: Strawberry Matcha Latte
description: Enjoy the vibrant blend of strawberries and matcha in our creamy Strawberry Matcha Latte —a refreshing, antioxidant-packed treat.

name: Coffee Milk Tea
description: Savor the perfect harmony of coffee and milk tea in our comforting and satisfying Coffee Milk Tea.

name: Peach Oolong Tea
description: Elevate your tea time with the fragrant fusion of ripe peaches and delicate oolong in our Peach Oolong Tea.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Savor the earthy richness of matcha green tea in our creamy and comforting Matcha Latte.

name: Brown Sugar Milk Tea
description: Indulge in the sweet nostalgia of Brown Sugar Milk Tea, a delightful blend of rich milk tea and caramelized brown sugar pearls

name: Creme Brulee Strawberry Latte
description: Experience the luxurious fusion of caramelized crème brûlée and fresh strawberries in our indulgent Creme Brulee Strawberry Latte.

name: Lychee Oolong Tea
description: Refresh your senses with the delicate floral notes of Lychee Oolong Tea, a harmonious blend of lychee fruit and fragrant oolong leaves.

name: Pearl Milk Tea
description: Delight in the classic favorite Pearl Milk Tea, featuring chewy tapioca pearls in a creamy, sweet tea base.

name: Taro Milk Tea
description: Indulge in the rich and creamy allure of our Taro Milk Tea, a purple potion that takes your taste buds on a delightful journey.

name: Strawberry Milk Tea
description: Experience the sweet embrace of summer with our Strawberry Milk Tea, a luscious and refreshing treat.

name: Peach Lemon Oolong Tea
description: Sip on pure refreshment with our Peach Lemon Oolong Tea, a zesty and fruity blend that's perfect for any time of day.

name: Mango Pomelo Sago Tea
description: Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with our Mango Pomelo Sago Tea, a tantalizing fusion of exotic flavors in every sip.
